item.title: Personas
item.author: francois@carpentries.org (François Michonneau)
item.description: What are personas? Personas are imaginary users for a project. By articulating their background, the problem they face, and how your project is going to help them, personas provide a way to determine the scope of your project, identify use cases, and essential features. The Carpentries use this approach when designing new lessons. The personas The lesson creators Robin is a graduate student in neurosciences and has developed a Python library for image analysis.
